meanings.sent1: She gathered all the gubbinses from her desk into a box.
meanings.sent2: The drawer was full of gubbinses like paper clips and rubber bands.
meanings.sent3: In a rush, he accidentally mixed up the gubbinses in his bag with his lunch.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumble of gubbinses, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The attic was a treasure trove of forgotten gubbinses.

meanings.definition: things of little value or importance
meanings.sent1: The old man's pockets were always full of gubbinses he picked up on his walks.
meanings.sent2: She didn't care about the gubbinses left behind at the yard sale.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the gubbinses on the floor, finding joy in the simple things.
meanings.sent4: His words were just gubbinses, lacking any real meaning.
meanings.sent5: The box of broken toys was a collection of discarded gubbinses.
